schema:
- type: TARGET_TIME_SERIES
  path: s3://sagemaker-us-west-2-932478379847/DEMO-convect-byo/target_ts.csv
  format: csv
  schema:
    key: [item_id]
    time: date
    values:
      - name: sales
        type: num
- type: RELATED_TIME_SERIES
  path: s3://sagemaker-us-west-2-932478379847/DEMO-convect-byo/stock_ts.csv
  format: csv
  schema:
    key: [item_id]
    time: date
    values: [stock]
- type: ITEM_METADATA
  path: s3://sagemaker-us-west-2-932478379847/DEMO-convect-byo/cate_info.csv
  format: csv
  schema:
    key: [item_id]
    values:
      - name: cate1
        type: str
      - name: cate2
        type: str
      - name: cate3
        type: str
config:
ml_sum_model:
  cv_param:
    split_train_frac: 0.8
    split_type: time_split
    train_folder_cnt: 3
  dt_feature_extraction_params:
    - feature_name: isoweekday
    - feature_name: is_workday_CN
    - feature_name: days_to_next_holiday_CN
    - feature_name: days_since_last_holiday_CN
    - feature_name: days_since_last_workday_CN
  encoder_param:
    autoOneHotThreshold: 5
  impute_param:
    fill_value: 0
    strategy: constant
  main_ts_rolling_params:
    - rolling_method: mean
      size:
        - 1
        - 3
        - 5
        - 7
        - 14
        - 21
        - 28
        - 90
        - 120
    - rolling_method: lag
      size:
        - 7
        - 14
        - 21
        - 28
    - rolling_method: std
      size:
        - 3
        - 5
        - 7
        - 14
        - 21
        - 28
  ml_model_params:
    - method_ind: lgb
      param_opt_ind: random
      param_model:
        objective: tweedie
        tweedie_variance_power: 1.4
  model_select_method: manual
  model_select_param:
    metrics_funcs:
      - mae
      - mse
      - mad
    only_use_out_sample: true
  other_ts_rolling_params:
    - rolling_method: mean
      size:
        - 1
        - 7
        - 14
        - 21
        - 28
  scaler_param:
    scaler_method: MaxAbs
  train_expand_param:
    - long_jump_interval_list: [30, 60, 90]
      num_short_jumps: 10
      short_jump_interval: 3
    - long_jump_interval_list: [30, 60, 90]
      num_short_jumps: 10
      short_jump_interval: 5
    - long_jump_interval_list: [30, 60, 90]
      num_short_jumps: 6
      short_jump_interval: 7
  ts_window_param:
    time_window: 60
predict_target_params:
  - predict_horizon: 7
    predict_offset: 0
quantile_model_alpha_params:
  - 0.1
  - 0.3
  - 0.7
  - 0.9
run_ml_quantile_model: false
